name: Resonance of Fate 2
description:
DISCLAIMER This is a non-profit fan game based on Resonance of Fate (End of Eternity in japanese).

Original rights belongs to tri-Ace INC and Sega. SYNOPSIS

Weird creatures have been sighted in the tower of Basel.

The cardinals have sent a mission to Vashyron and his crew to handle the threat. As they step into the monsters lair, Leanne got separated from Zephyr and Vashyron.

 

FEATURES

Experience a recreated version of the battle system of Resonance of Fate in a 2.5D perspective. New exciting mechanics have been added, and previous one have been revisited.

NOTES
  • The game does not support keyboard input.
  • The game length is about one hour.
CREDITS
  • Programmer   -   Yonax
  • Level Design   -   Seven11
